mapper.select: select t2.id, t2.file_group_name as fileGroupName, t2.create_time as createTime, t2.creator, t2.`status` from tb_sys_permission_files t1 , tb_sys_file_group t2 where t1.file_group_id = t2.id and t1.`status` = '1' and t2.`status` = '1' and t1.permission_id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select id, file_group_name as fileGroupName, create_time as createTime, creator, `status` from tb_sys_file_group where id not in (select t2.id from tb_sys_permission_files t1 , tb_sys_file_group t2 where t1.file_group_id = t2.id and t1.`status` = '1' and t2.`status` = '1' and t1.permission_id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}) and `status` = '1'
